description.en:
New adaptation of the novel.  
  
The story is staged in the distant future within our own Milky Way Galaxy, approximately in the late 36th century. A portion of the galaxy is filled with terraformed worlds inhabited by interstellar traveling human beings. For 150 years two mighty space powers have intermittently warred with each other: the Galactic Empire and the Free Planets Alliance. Within the Galactic Empire, based on mid 19th century Prussia, an ambitious military genius, Reinhard von Müsel, later conferred Reinhard von Lohengramm, is rising to power. He is driven by the desire to free his sister Annerose, who was taken by the Kaiser as a concubine. Later, he wants not only to end the corrupt Goldenbaum dynasty but also to defeat the Free Planets Alliance and to unify the whole galaxy under his rule.  
  
In the Free Planets Alliance Star Fleet is another genius, Yang Wen Li. He originally aspired to become a historian through a military academy, and joined the tactical division only out of need for tuition money. He was rapidly promoted to an admiral because he demonstrated excellence in military strategy in a number of decisive battles and conflicts. He becomes the archrival of Reinhard, though they highly respect one another. Unlike Reinhard he is better known for his underdog victories and accomplishments in overcoming seemingly impossible odds and mitigating casualties and damages due to military operations.  
As a historian, Yang often predicts the motives behind his enemies and narrates the rich history of his world and comments on it. One of his famous quotes is: "There are few wars between good and evil; most are between one good and another good."  
  


---
description.ru:
Новая экранизация романа.  
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

Then on a certain day, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of *MamaFan*... However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who's got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who's crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!

description.en:
Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games.
Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things.
When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink.
A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy!

(Source: Melonbooks, edited)
description.ja: 街の書店「BOOK FOREST」で店長を務める畑本育人は、ゲームの「推し」キャラに課金してしまうオタク気質。バイトリーダーの轟ミランは、店長に憧れるものの、データに課金することだけは理解できない。「オレにとって課金は投資だ」と話す育人に、「それならあたしにも投資…して?」と話すミランだが…。投資と還元を繰り返し、2人の心の距離が揺れ動く――新感覚の投資ラブコメ！
description.pt-br:
Hatamoto Ikuto, gerente da livraria local “BOOK FOREST”, é um otaku que não resiste a gastar dinheiro com seus personagens favoritos dos jogos.
Todoroki Miran, líder de meio período, o admira, mas não consegue entender sua obsessão por gastar em coisas de jogos.
Quando Ikuto afirma: “Para mim, gastar dinheiro é um investimento”, Miran provoca: “Se é assim, que tal você investir em mim...?”
Enquanto os dois navegam em um ciclo de investimentos e retornos, a distância entre seus corações começa a diminuir.
Uma comédia romântica única e encantadora com tema de investimento!

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.es:
Rentaro Aijou es una máquina de declararse y de recibir calabazas, consiguiendo la cifra de 100 rechazos al final de la secundaria. Roto por dentro, va a rezar a un santuario de suerte en el amor para pedir que la fortuna le sonría. Para su sorpresa, el dios del santuario se le aparece y le promete que conocerá a 100 almas gemelas durante el bachillerato.

Aunque al principio cree que le ha tomado el pelo, el primer día de clase se le declaran dos chicas en cuanto lo conocen, así que ve que sus rezos funcionaron y la cosa pinta bien. Sin embargo, hay un pequeño detalle que el dios no le explicó: si alguna de estas almas gemelas no consigue establecer una relación con él, esa chica morirá. Su gran corazón hace que no pueda permitir que eso suceda en ningún caso y por eso, ¡decide que saldrá con todas ellas!

¡Su nueva e inesperada vida de bachillerato, llena de amor, confusiones y un montón de chicas, le depara una sorpresa tras otra!

(Fuente: Editorial Ivrea)
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.en:
One day, the most beautiful girl in school suddenly shows up at Kento Ikuno's door. She shows him a "ticket" written in awkward handwriting. This is the start of a romantic comedy about a "ticket to do anything I say" that came from his childhood.

[Alternative Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60455)

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

altTitles.ja: 乙女戦争 ディーヴチー・ヴァールカ

altTitles.en: The Maidens' War: Dívčí Válka
Maidens War - Divichi Valka

altTitles.fr: Divci Valka, La guerre des pucelles

description.en:
The year is 1420. A small village in the Kingdom of Bohemia is wiped out by marauding Crusader knights. A young peasant girl named Šárka is the sole survivor of the massacre. She meets up with Jan Žižka, leader of the Hussite army, and chooses to take up arms…
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/divci-valka-maidens-war)
description.pt-br: O ano é 1420. Uma pequena vila no Reino da Boêmia é destruída por cavaleiros da cruzada. Uma jovem camponesa chamada Sarka é a única sobrevivente do massacre. Ela se encontra com Jan Zizka, líder do exército hussita, e decide pegar em armas…

title.en: Abandoned ~Tsuyosugite Buki ga Kowareru Yuusha to Buki Shokunin no Elf~

altTitles.ja: アバンダンド〜強すぎて武器が壊れる勇者と武器職人のエルフ〜

altTitles.en: Abandoned: The Hero Who's So Strong He Breaks Every Weapon, and the Elf Weaponsmith

altTitles.tr: Terk edilmiş: Her Silahı Kıracak Kadar Güçlü Kahraman ve Elf Silah Ustası

description.en: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.

altTitles.en: My Dear Forensic Lady

description.en:
Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... 

They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

altTitles.en: Overgeared (Team Argo)

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

title.en: Kimi to Koete Koi ni Naru

altTitles.ja: キミと越えて恋になる

altTitles.en: With You, Our Love Will Make It Through
Crossing the Walls of Love with You
Cross Race and Love You

altTitles.th: ก้าวข้ามรักต่างสายพันธุ์

description.en:
Mari is a high school student living in a town where beastmen and humans coexist. When she is late for school, she meets Tsunagu, a beastman who has come to the school as a "special student" for the Beastman Education Program, at the front gate. Mari is bewildered by her first contact with a beastman, but as she gets to know him, she is drawn to his kind and pure side. However, some of her classmates don't seem to take kindly to beastmen, and suddenly the two of them are locked in a warehouse. Suddenly, they are locked in a warehouse and Tsunagu hugs her! He says, "You smell sweet..." His breathing becomes ragged.

A human and a beastman. What will happen to the love between two people who transcend race?
Pure and exciting interspecies youth love.

altTitles.ja: 10万分の1

description.en:
2nd-year high school student Rino Sakuragi has been in love with Ren Kiritani, a member of her friends-circle since junior high. Rino, who cannot love either her character nor body, is incredibly shy towards the popular Kiritani.  
  
*Being friends suits me just fine. After all, I don't want to be hated once he gets to know the real me.*  
  
Even though she's resigned herself to that, she cannot help but stay in love with Kiritani as he keeps on dropping suggestive lines like, "Cute." or "What do you think about me?"  
  
*I want the person I love to really get to know the real me. But because it's the person I love, I need more courage!!*  
  
1/100 000, a story about a destiny between the lines of cruelty and joy by the master of pure love romance Kaho Miyasaka.

title.en: Pashiri na Boku to Koisuru Banchou-san

altTitles.es-la: El chico de los recados y la líder de la pandilla enamorados

altTitles.en: Errand Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Pashiri na Boku to Koi suru Banchou

altTitles.en: The Errand Boy and the Banchou in Love
The Lackey and the Delinquent Leader in Love

altTitles.ja: パシリな僕と恋する番長さん

altTitles.en: I Belong to the Baddest Girl at School

altTitles.zh: 小弟的我与热恋的番长

description.en:
Unoki-kun, a boy who's been bullied since elementary school, ends up becoming the exclusive errand boy of the top delinquent of his school, Toramaru-san, who told him "Be mine" right after entering high school. But the truth is that Toramaru-san meant it as a confession of love!!

This is the beginning of a love misunderstanding between Toramaru-san, who thinks she's in a relationship, and Unoki-kun, who thinks he's being bullied.
description.ja: 昔からいじめられっ子体質の卯之木くんは、高校に入学しても早々、不良のトップ――寅丸番長に「私のモンになれ」と専属パシリにされてしまう。でもその実、寅丸さんは卯之木くんに告白したつもりだった!? 恋人関係だと思い込んでる寅丸さんとパシリにされたと思い込んでる卯之木くんの勘違恋(かんちごい)の始まり☆
description.ru: Уноки — парень, над которым издевались с начальной школы, в конечном итоге становится мальчиком на побегушках главной хулиганки школы, Торамару, которая сказала ему «будь моим» сразу после поступления в среднюю школу. Но правда в том, что Торамару таким образом призналась в любви!! Это начало любовного недопонимания между Торамару, которая думает, что она в отношениях, и Уноки, который думает, что над ним издеваются.
description.pt-br: Unoki-kun, um garoto sofreu bullying desde o primário acaba se tornando o garoto de recados da maior delinquente de sua escola, Toramaru-san, que falou para ele “Seja meu” logo depois de entrar no ensino médio, mas a verdade é que Totamaru-san estava confessando seu amor!! Esse é o começo de um amor mal-entendido entre Toramaru-san, que pensa que está namorando, e Unoki, que pensa que está sofrendo bullying dela.

description.en: After making a grisly discovery in the countryside, a small town book editor’s life gets entangled with a young Mafia lord and his intimidating bodyguard…even as every step she takes draws her deeper into the dangerous underworld of the city.

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook
Maidragon Compendium

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.vi: Một nữ tu sĩ trẻ đã thành lập nhóm phiêu lưu đầu tiên của mình, nhưng gần như ngay lập tức họ thấy mình đang đau khổ. Đó là Goblin Slayer đến giải cứu — một người đã cống hiến cuộc sống của mình cho việc tiêu diệt tất cả những yêu tinh, bằng mọi cách cần thiết. Và khi những tin đồn về những kỳ công của anh ấy bắt đầu lan truyền, thì không ai nói được ai có thể gọi tới...
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

altTitles.ja: Haisu Koa Gaaru Dasshu
Hi Score Girl DASH

altTitles.en: High Score Girl: Dash

altTitles.ja: ハイスコアガールDASH

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

altTitles.ja: ニャンて男

description.en:
What if your dream date turns out to be a…cat? Such is the dilemma for Bonnie, a young woman who wanted love and ended up with Claude, a highly needy half-man-half-cat instead. Will they be able to make it work? Is sharing the litterbox going to be a huge problem? And what ARE her friends going to think? Read Meow Man to see how this big ball of yarn unfurls.  
  
  
Que feriez-vous si vous vous réveillez face à une personne mi-homme mi-chat ? Tel est la situation dans laquelle se trouve Bonnie…

title.en: Doumo, Zense de Satsuriku no Madougu wo Tsukutteita Shishaku Reijou desu.

altTitles.ja: どうも、前世で殺戮の魔道具を作っていた子爵令嬢です。

description.en: The viscount's daughter, Chloe, was the chief magical tools artisan for a country that perished a thousand years ago in her previous life.  On the country's orders, she had created many weapons of slaughter. She laments her previous life and decides to, "live a respectable life this time." One day, at her graduation party, her best friend's engagement is broken off because of a lie. Chloe tries to save her best friend by unraveling the truth.

title.en: Savage Fang Ojou-sama: Shijou Saikyou no Youhei wa Shijou Sai Kyou no Bougyaku Reijou to Natte Futatabime no Sekai o Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: サベージファングお嬢様 史上最強の傭兵は史上最凶の暴虐令嬢となって二度目の世界を無双する

altTitles.en: Miss Savage Fang: The Strongest Mercenary in History Is Reincarnated as an Unstoppable Noblewoman
Savage Fang Ojou-sama: The Most Powerful Mercenary in History Becomes the Most Tyrannical Daughter in History and Becomes a Warrior in the World for the Second Time

altTitles.vi: Nang Thú Hoang Dã: Lính Đánh Thuê Mạnh Nhất Trở Thành Tiểu Thư Tàn Bạo Nhất và Xưng Bá Thế Giới Lần Thứ Hai.

description.en:
This is the story of a "princess" who torments the whole world.

She is loved by God, she has beautiful hair, and she wields a violent blade. She was the prettiest young lady in the kingdom, but she was also the most powerful of mercenaries, nicknamed "Savage Fang." All of them are now beginning to be trampled by a girl who defies expectations.
description.fr:
C'est l'histoire d'une "princesse" qui tourmente le monde entier.
Elle est aimée de Dieu, et elle a de beaux cheveux enfoncés, et elle manie une lame violente. Elle était la plus jolie jeune femme du royaume, mais elle était la plus puissante des mercenaires, surnommée "Savage Fang". Tous commencent maintenant à se faire piétiner par une fille hors normes !
Auteur
Akaishi Kaoru
description.id:
Mylene, putri seorang duke, memiliki rambut indah berkilauan yang disebut sebagai tanda “yang dipilih Dewa” dan memiliki kekuatan sihir yang kuat di tubuhnya. Dia adalah gadis paling cantik di kerajaan, memiliki rambut yang tergerai dan mengayunkan pedangnya dengan anggun. Tapi sebenarnya dia adalah… tentara bayaran terkuat dalam sejarah, yang dikenal sebagai “Savage Fang”! Seorang pejuang legendaris yang telah membantai ribuan musuh dengan kemampuan fisiknya yang luar biasa telah bereinkarnasi sebagai wanita muda yang membanggakan bakat sihir dari dewa! Seorang gadis dengan kekuatan sihir yang tak tertandingi dan keterampilan bertarung yang hebat, dia memikirkan kembali situasi dunia sambil melibatkan orang-orang dari aliansi dan mendominasi benua…! Dia terlihat seperti seorang saint, tapi di dalam dirinya adalah binatang buas. menyembunyikan taring prajuritnya yang ganas di balik senyum seorang wanita muda saat dia berjuang melewati dunia yang penuh dengan kekacauan untuk kedua kalinya!

Serialisasi Savage Fang Ojou-sama akan dirilis pada musim dingin 2022
description.vi:
Đây là câu chuyện về một "công chúa" khuấy đảo cả thế giới.

Cô được Thần yêu thương, sở hữu mái tóc tuyệt đẹp và một thanh kiếm sắc bén đầy bạo lực. Cô từng là tiểu thư xinh đẹp nhất vương quốc, nhưng cũng là lính đánh thuê mạnh nhất với biệt danh "Nang Thú Hoang Dã." Giờ đây, tất cả bọn họ bắt đầu bị đè bẹp dưới chân của một cô gái vượt xa mọi kỳ vọng.

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンバンド

altTitles.en: Dungeon & GIrl Band

description.en: The band Mayonnais has never had an audience at their live shows. So they pray to God for someone to listen to their performance, but who appears before them?

description.de:
Ein mysteriöser Mann erscheint plötzlich in einer Wüste, welche den Ost- und Westkontinent trennt. Der Junge Yulian Provoke vom Pareia-Stamm findet diesen Mann und bringt ihn in sein Dorf. Es stellt sich heraus, dass der Mann eine extrem starke und erstaunliche Person ist und er fängt an, den jungen Yulian zu trainieren.

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.en:
A mysterious man suddenly appears in the desert separating the East and West Continents. A young boy, Yulian Provoke from the Pareia tribe finds this man, and brings him to his village. Turns out the man is an incredibly strong and amazing individual, and he begins to teach the young boy fighting skills.

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.fr:
C’est décidé, il deviendra le plus grand guerrier du désert ! À l’âge de 15 ans, notre héros fait la rencontre d’un maître duquel il souhaite tout apprendre. Manier les armes à la perfection, s’élever spirituellement, tuer les monstres… Il sera alors prêt à venger sa tribu ! Seulement, l'entraînement s’avèrera bien plus difficile que prévu…

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.ko:
사막의 찐득찐득한 모래바람과, 그곳을 질주하는 전사들의 이야기

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.ru:
История берёт начало с того, что мальчик Юлиан Провок из Парейского племени встречает таинственного человека в пустыне между Восточным и Западным континентами, и приводит его к себе в деревню. 
Обнаруживается, что этот мужчина на самом деле невероятно сильная и удивительная личность. Вскоре он начинает обучать юношу боевым навыкам.

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)
description.pt-br:
"Grandes cavaleiros buscam a glória através de lutas contra monstros." Em um mundo cheio de monstros, nosso jovem protagonista encontra um homem perdido no meio do deserto, um homem que não fala a sua mesma lingua, um homem também muito poderoso e mestre em artes marciais… quais são os segredos por trás desse homem, e quais batalhas nosso protagonista irá enfrentar!?  

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/red-storm)

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion - Digital Colored Comics
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Parte 8 : JoJolion - Color Digital

altTitles.ru: Невероятные Приключения ДжоДжо Часть 8: Джоджолион (цветная версия)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン
ジョジョリオン
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

description.en:
Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

altTitles.en: DGM

altTitles.ja: ディー・グレイマン

description.en:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…
description.pt-br:
Perder um ente querido é tão doloroso que às vezes podemos desejar ressuscitá-lo - uma fraqueza que o enigmático Conde do Millennium explora. Para tornar suas armas mecânicas conhecidas como “Akuma”, ele usa as almas dos mortos que são chamadas de volta. Uma vez que uma alma é colocada em um Akuma, ela fica presa para sempre, e a única maneira de salvá-la é exorcizá-la de seu recipiente usando a arma Anti-Akuma, "Inocência".

Depois de passar três anos como discípulo do General Cross, Allen Walker é enviado para a Ordem Negra – uma organização composta por aqueles dispostos a lutar contra Akuma e o Conde do Milênio – para se tornar um Exorcista oficial. Com um braço como sua Inocência e um olho amaldiçoado que pode ver as almas sofredoras dentro de um Akuma, cabe a Allen e seus colegas Exorcistas impedir a trama final do Conde do Millennium: uma que pode levar à destruição do mundo.

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !
description.ja: 樹木暦1294年。音が“見える”ラッパ手の少年・リュカは傭兵団に属しながらも戦争を嫌い、楽師になる事を夢見ていた。しかしある日、「枝憑き」と呼ばれる力が発現し、彼の運命は大きく動き出す――。

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

altTitles.en: Best Wishes, Bitch

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.vi:
"T-tớ đã cắm sừng cậu, không chỉ một anh đâu...là ba anh lận cơ!"
Những câu nói như gai sắt cứa vào tim cậu từ cuối cấp hai năm ấy vẫn còn làm cậu ám ảnh. Akiyoshi Sunao, hiện tại cậu đã trở thành sinh viên năm nhất và làm thành viên của câu lạc bộ phim ảnh, cậu còn nỗi ám ảnh kia là từ mối tình đầu hồi cuối cấp hai của cậu, Lemon Nishikawa. Cậu đã mất niềm tin vào tình yêu suốt cả cao trung, đến khi lên đại học thì anh đã phải lòng crush mới hơn mình một tuổi tên Kogahara Natsumi. Ngay khi cậu nghĩ mình đã suýt thì "move on" và tìm được tình yêu mới để tận hưởng thanh xuân, "Cô bạn" bắt cá bốn tay năm nào lại vô tình xuất hiện. Khoảnh khắc ấy, những câu nói chí mạng như hiện về cứa cậu thêm phát nữa...Cậu đã cố gắng lảng tránh cô người yêu cũ ấy và cổ vũ bản thân vượt lên sự kiện mọc sừng ấy. Cậu suýt thì thành công...
"S-sao mình lại biến thành ghệ cũ của mình?!"
Cậu đã bị hoán đổi linh hồn với chính cô nàng người yêu cũ ấy, và đối phương cũng nhận ra điều đó. Họ phải làm gì để vượt qua nghịch cảnh? Liệu họ có nhìn nhận lại những góc khuất của nhau? Và liệu họ có trở lại với nhau? Mời các bạn đọc truyện nhé!~

Fun fact: Tiêu đề tiếng Nhật của truyện này có thể được dịch thẳng là "Hạnh Phúc Nhé, Con Đĩ!"
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

altTitles.ja: キングダム ハーツ 358/2 Days

description.en: In Kingdom Hearts, Sora turned the Keyblade on himself in order to release Kairi's heart, but his heart was also released in the process. This brought about the creation of Roxas, Sora's Nobody. Unlike most Nobodies, however, Roxas has no memories of his past. He joins Oragnization XIII and slowly begins to discover the truth behind his existence and the Organization itself. He meets and befriends the fourteenth member of the Organization, who also has no recollection of her past. What will Roxas see during his time in the Organization? What is the connection between him, Sora, and the fourteenth member? And what becomes of them? Dive into the heart of Kingdom Hearts storyline's biggest secret.

altTitles.ja: シガンバナ

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.
description.pt-br:
Neste país aparentemente pacífico, vive um assassino que caça outros de sua espécie - um assassino de assassinos. Antes de eliminar seus alvos, ele sempre questiona seus motivos para matar - esta é sua maneira de abraçar seu destino.

Do autor de "Until Your Bones Rot" e "The Shadows of Who We Once Were", Utsumi Yae apresenta um drama emocionante sobre as vidas daqueles que vivem no limite entre a vida e a morte.
